name: make4thon
description:
Name is particularly aimed at solving some of the major issues an army person faces in a base camp. The major solutions we are trying to add in this project are : 1.Providing a system capable of allowing users to communicate using a Bluetooth based mesh network at a time of no cellular network availability.
2.Required person can update information like food, medical facility, etc. and accordingly forward the requests to authorities.
3. Interface for the control room to monitor the soldierâ€™s last position and movement when under network.
